casebody.data:
Monday, November 29, 1999

MOTION DOCKET

99-2489. Columbus School Dist. Bd. of Edn. v. Tracy.

Board of Tax Appeals, Nos. 95-G-693 and 95-G-716. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals. Upon consideration of the joint motion for continuance of oral argument currently scheduled for November 30, 1999 and request to expedite,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for continuance of oral argument be, and hereby is, granted.
